alert.note: Alert for Carter; Johnston; Marshall; Murray (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 3:58PM CDT until November 04 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR WESTERN JOHNSTON...SOUTHEASTERN CARTER...NORTHWESTERN MARSHALL AND SOUTHEASTERN MURRAY COUNTIES... At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Mannsville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dickson, Mannsville, Ravia, Mill Creek, Connerville, Russett and Reagan. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
